DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : To compare Insuman Implantable 400 IU/ml versus Insuplant 400 IU/ml respect pump refill accuracy 4 refill cycle period ( i.e . comparative phase ) ; To assess efficacy measure hemoglobin glycosylated ( HBA1c ) change Insuman Implantable 400 IU/ml group versus Insuplant 400 IU/ml group 4 refill cycle period ( i.e . comparative phase ) . Secondary Objective : To assess efficacy , safety , refill accuracy evolution device intervention open-label treatment period Insuman To evaluate daily insulin dos To assess Anti-Insulin Antibodies ( ADAs AIA ) level study phase
DOC.brief_title: Benefit/Risk Evaluation Insuman Implantable Versus Insuplant Using Medtronic MiniMed Implantable Pump System Patients With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: The study duration display 2 part follow : Comparative phase ( French patient ) : 160 +/- 20 day Open label Insuman Implantable extension phase ( French European patient ) : day 160 grant Insuman implantable marketing authorization
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Patients already treat Insuplant 400 IU/ml via Medtronic Implantable System 2007 2 . Glycosylated hemoglobin â‰¤9.0 % 3 . Patient show percentage error refill equal 20 % 4 . Patient undergoing NaOH rinse procedure least 10 minute period without flush Or Patient reimplanted new pump ( first fill insulin ) 5 . Signed informed consent form prior enrolment Exclusion criterion : 1 . Pump life time > 6 year 2 . Pump battery voltage < 2.6 volt 3 . Pregnancy childbearing potential without medically approve form birth control The information intend contain consideration relevant patient 's potential participation clinical trial .
